formatted_address: 585 N Bridge Rd, Level 13 Raffles Specialist Centre, Singapore 188770
name: Raffles Urology Centre

reviews.text: I had kidney stones while visiting Singapore and Dr Li Man Kay was great at explaining my condition and answering all my questions. He was extremely knowledgeable and professional. The hospital is also very nice
I was attended by Nurse Ms Radhika at the Urology centre and I was very pleased with her proactive patient engagement during my visit

Generally not so good experience at Raffles Urology Center, appreciating the nice clinic environment and friendly staff. However, the waiting time, both for your appointment and for medication and payment, was a bit of a drawback. Considering there are only few patients when I visited. I spent an hour here. 15 mins for consultation, 45 mins just waiting. Delays like that can be frustrating, especially when you have an appointment. I mean you should not expect nothing less in a high class institution.

Fantastic service. The Urologist answered all my questions, and even gave me answers to questions I had not even thought about. He was incredibly present, helpful and knowledgable.

Will for sure return for future appointments if required!
He my friend dad so equal sigma

vicinity: 585 North Bridge Road, Level 13 Raffles Specialist Centre
